name: Carlton F. ANDERSON, Appellant v. The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Anderson v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of June, 2013, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

69 A.3d 216
Carlton F. ANDERSON, Appellant v. The PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
